labels.label: We would likely include a database call to understand if there was a route for this specific ProcessorName in this specific ProcessorGroup. . . If there is an automated fix, we could route it to that fix here. If there is an error that we don't have an automated fix for and we know does won't succeed upon retry, we can immediately route it to the appropriate destination here. Like an alert. For now, I have shown this relationship below leaving the "RouteOnAttribute" as ImmediateFailure
We would have some type of alert triggered here
